text: Mohammed Jabbar Shokan (; born 21 May 1993 in Basra, Iraq) is an Iraqi footballer who plays as a forward for Al-Shorta in the Iraqi Premier League. ==International career== On 24 July 2016, Shokan won his first international cap with Iraq against Uzbekistan in a friendly match. === International goals === :Scores and results list Iraq's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" ! # !! Date !! Venue !! Opponent !! Score !! Result !! title: Mohammed Shokan
